about_the_game:
The Sumeragi Group is proud to present the debut album of their electrifying virtual pop star, Lumen!

Featuring her songs from Azure Striker Gunvolt, you will now be able to listen to the Muse in all her glory!

These versions of Lumen's songs have all been recorded with a full chorus, and are only available on this soundtrack!

TRACK LIST
1.Beyond the Blue
2.Nebulous Clock
3.Rouge Shimmer
4.Pain From the Past
5.Azure Door
6.A Zip to the Moon
7.Scorching Journey
8.Reincarnation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7 or 8.1
  • Processor: 2Ghz or faster processer
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
